about_the_game:
The hordes of chaos never stop, to survive the Warlocks War you need powerful skills and strategies. Warlock Survivors is the relentless battleground where you can face countless hordes of enemies in a single frantic run. The game is a Action Roguelite inspired in Vampire Survivors and Lord of the RIngs with different stages and enemies. You can increase your power and improve your skills by making the right decisions and face an army of thousands.


  • Combat Options - A frantic chaos on the battlefield, but not without options, to face the horde of enemies there are many possibilities, from varied special attacks to defense skills and support items.
  • More Warlocks - The first character controlled is the Necromancer, but it is possible to unlock other warlocks by fulfilling certain objectives during the stages.
  • Slow Motion - To enjoy the destruction even more, and also to take a breath, the slow motion skill can be acquired and improved.

The hordes of chaos never stop, to survive the Warlocks War you need powerful skills and strategies. Warlock Survivors is the relentless battleground where you can face countless hordes of enemies in a single frantic run. The game is a Action Roguelite inspired in Vampire Survivors and Lord of the RIngs with different stages and enemies. You can increase your power and improve your skills by making the right decisions and face an army of thousands.


  • Combat Options - A frantic chaos on the battlefield, but not without options, to face the horde of enemies there are many possibilities, from varied special attacks to defense skills and support items.
  • More Warlocks - The first character controlled is the Necromancer, but it is possible to unlock other warlocks by fulfilling certain objectives during the stages.
  • Slow Motion - To enjoy the destruction even more, and also to take a breath, the slow motion skill can be acquired and improved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Warlock Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: The hordes of chaos never stop, to survive the Warlocks War you need powerful skills and strategies. Warlock Survivors is the battleground where you will face hundreds of thousands of enemies in a single frantic run. Upgrade your build and grab all resources you can to reach enough power to survive.
